reviewText: Arrived on time and happy its part of my collection to watch!

Clear image and graphics. At first I thought that it didn't have any subtitles, but you need to wait till it officially starts the episode it comes on automatically or just press subtitles on your remote (there is no language option except clean title opening in the extras). The case is thicker than the average dvd case, (about the size of two) with the dvd's stacked on top of each other rather than in several layers of dvds in an individual place.
Perfect Condition! Really liked the anime except there was no romance :/
I love this series very much. I could not stop watching it. It is a must have for any person who own anime.

Arcadia is a land being taken over by creatures called Thanatos. People known as Purifiers are the only known defense against them. However, there are only a few of them and the Thanatos are multiplying and becoming even more troublesome. The Purifiers must work together with their allies and find a way to stop the Thanatos.

This is such a good show. The characters and story line are interesting. Everything in the anime is so colorful. The artwork is beautiful. Although after a few episodes I could guess the ending, knowing the title and all. Although, I already guessed how it would end, I was still disappointed that I was right with the ending. I wished it ended differently, which is why I gave it 4 stars.

I love having complete collections not only does it save more space on your book case but it also has all the episodes that you can watch again and again. This anime had pretty artwork and i love the plot just wish they made more of this anime.
This DVD is pretty good. I definitely enjoy the anime series quite a bit, and I definitely recommend this to my family and friends. Thanks!
